name: Ice Tea

description: Refreshing tropicana juice and perfect for breakfast or lunch specials.

name: Coffee
description: Rich and aromatic brew to kickstart your day. Perfect for breakfast or lunch.

description: Refreshing carbonated drink to complement your meal.

description: Carbonated soft drink with a bold cola flavor.

description: A crisp, satisfying taste to quench thirst and energize without caffeine.

description: Typically includes a variety of flavors such as original, peach tea, pipeline punch, and irish cream java.

name: Bloom
description: Natural energy drink with options: watermelon, cherry lime, raspberry lemon, and peach mango. Contains natural caffeine, boosts energy, and supports mood.
